title: Authentication Failure: Cannot Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times, but the system still rejects the credentials.

title: Payment Processing Error: Card Declined
description: Customer attempted to pay using Visa ending 1234, but the payment continuously fails despite confirming sufficient balance with their bank.

title: UI Bug: Invoice Download Button Non-Functional
description: Customer cannot download their January invoice from the billing section. The 'Download' button is visible but non-responsive when clicked.

title: Data Persistence Issue: Billing Address Mismatch
description: Customer's billing address shows an incorrect city. They updated the field, but the system incorrectly displays the old data upon refreshing.

title: Billing Inquiry: Refund for Transaction Not Applied
description: Customer requested a refund two weeks ago for transaction #RTX-901. The refund has not yet been processed or reflected in their account balance.

title: Authentication Bug: Two-Factor Setup Failure
description: Customer is unable to complete the 2FA setup process after changing their phone number. The system fails to send or validate the security code.

title: Data Integrity: CSV Export File Corrupted
description: Customer attempted to export their client list (10k records), but the resulting CSV file is malformed, showing incorrect encoding or missing delimiters.

title: System Error: Subscription Upgrade Failed
description: Attempting to switch from the Basic to Premium plan results in an 'Unexpected Error' message. The plan upgrade is not processed on the backend.

title: Documentation Request: Guide to API Key Generation
description: New developer requires guidance on where to locate and how to properly generate the API key for system integration.

title: Connectivity Issue: Intermittent Server Disconnection
description: Users are randomly disconnected from the main application server, lasting about 30 seconds, and then automatically reconnecting.

title: Billing Issue: Incorrect Charge After Cancellation
description: Customer canceled their account on the 5th of the month but was still charged the full monthly subscription fee on the 15th.

title: Broken Feature: Email Notification Link Error (404)
description: The 'View Details' link in the automated weekly activity summary email leads to a '404 Page Not Found' error.

title: Permissions Error: Profile Save Button Disabled
description: Users with the 'Contributor' role cannot click the 'Save' button after making changes to their personal profile details due to a permissions conflict.

title: Feature Request: Google Sheets Export Integration
description: Submitting a request for direct integration to export report data into a Google Sheets document, rather than only a static CSV file.

title: Administrative Request: Copy of Q3 2023 Invoice
description: Customer is missing the invoice for the Q3 2023 payment and requires a digital copy urgently for their internal accounting department.
